articles.title: Boston police release Super Bowl safety plan, limiting traffic, parking, pedestrian access
articles.description:
Traffic, parking, and pedestrian restrictions will be enforced around campuses and nightlife districts Sunday as frigid weather adds to public-safety concerns.

The post Boston police release Super Bowl safety plan, limiting traffic, parking, pedestrian access appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston police enforce traffic and parking restrictions on February 5 for Super Bowl Sunday.
Frigid weather raises public safety concerns around campuses and nightlife districts.
Residents should expect limited pedestrian access in high-traffic areas during the event.

articles.title: As storm cleanup lingers, City Council pushes for snow melters and dedicated ‘snow corps’
articles.description:
Officials say they've been receiving a surge of complaints from residents about the need for new snow removal strategies.

The post As storm cleanup lingers, City Council pushes for snow melters and dedicated ‘snow corps’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: City Council addresses surge in snow removal complaints from Boston residents.
Proposal includes new snow melters and a dedicated 'snow corps' for efficient cleanup.
Initiative aims to improve winter safety and accessibility for Boston neighborhoods.

articles.title: Not Drake Maye — just his Raynham, Mass., lookalike
articles.description:
Tyler Dumas has gone viral, fielded double takes from strangers, and embraced unexpected local fame as the Patriots quarterback's doppelgänger.

The post Not Drake Maye — just his Raynham, Mass., lookalike appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tyler Dumas, a Raynham resident, gains local fame as a Drake Maye lookalike.
Dumas has received numerous double takes from strangers in the Boston area.
His viral fame highlights the community's connection to popular sports figures.

articles.title: David Pastrnak will be a flag-bearer for Czechia at Winter Olympics opening ceremony
articles.description:
"Very, very honored."

summary: David Pastrnak will carry the Czech flag at the 2026 Winter Olympics opening ceremony.

Boston residents can take pride in Pastrnak's achievement on an international stage.

articles.title: After 25 years, MetroWest Jewish Day School will shut its doors
articles.description:
The school says its personalized approach to Jewish learning has become too costly to sustain.

The post After 25 years, MetroWest Jewish Day School will shut its doors appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: MetroWest Jewish Day School will close after 25 years of operation.
The school's personalized Jewish learning approach became unsustainable financially.
Local families will lose a key educational option in the MetroWest area.
